description: list() internal API endpoint returns 200 for valid install
list() returns schedules array for install with schedules
list() returns empty array for install without schedules
list() only returns schedules for the requesting install
list() does not return schedules from other installs
get() returns schedule for valid ID belonging to install
get() returns null for non-existent schedule ID
get() returns null for schedule belonging to different install
create() with valid input returns success=true
create() returns scheduleId in response
create() persists schedule to database
create() resolves endpoint path to endpoint_id
create() rejects non-existent endpoint path
create() rejects endpoint path with path parameters
create() rejects DELETE method endpoints
create() rejects PUT method endpoints
create() accepts GET method endpoints
create() accepts POST method endpoints
create() rejects invalid cron expression (wrong field count)
notes: Tests actual validateCronExpression() function from schedulerValidation.ts

description: create() rejects invalid cron expression (bad characters)
notes: Tests actual validateCronExpression() function from schedulerValidation.ts

description: create() rejects cron with both day-of-month and day-of-week
notes: Tests actual validateCronExpression() function from schedulerValidation.ts

description: create() rejects every-minute cron (*/1 * * * *)
notes: Tests actual validateCronExpression() function from schedulerValidation.ts

description: create() accepts every-5-minute cron (*/5 * * * *)
notes: Tests actual validateCronExpression() function from schedulerValidation.ts

description: create() rejects invalid timezone
notes: Tests actual validateTimezone() function from schedulerValidation.ts

description: create() accepts valid IANA timezone
notes: Tests actual validateTimezone() function from schedulerValidation.ts

description: create() defaults timezone to UTC when not provided
create() defaults enabled to true when not provided
create() rejects payload larger than 100KB
notes: Tests actual validatePayloadJson() function from schedulerValidation.ts

description: create() rejects non-JSON-serializable payload
notes: Tests actual validatePayloadJson() function from schedulerValidation.ts

description: create() rejects name longer than 128 characters
notes: Tests actual validateScheduleName() function from schedulerValidation.ts

description: create() enforces max 50 schedules per install
create() returns error when quota exceeded
create() returns field-level error for invalid cron
create() returns field-level error for invalid timezone
create() creates job runner schedule when enabled=true
create() does not create job runner schedule when enabled=false
create() handles duplicate name with descriptive error
create() rolls back if job runner schedule creation fails
create() cleans up job runner if DB insert fails
notes: Covered by T065 - same atomic rollback behavior

description: update() with valid input returns success=true
update() persists changes to database
update() validates new cron expression
update() validates new timezone
update() reschedules job when cron changes
update() reschedules job when timezone changes
update() cancels job when enabled changes to false
update() creates job when enabled changes to true
update() returns error for non-existent schedule
update() returns error for schedule from different install
update() can change endpoint by path
update() rejects invalid endpoint path
delete() removes schedule from database
delete() cancels underlying job runner schedule
delete() returns success for valid schedule
delete() returns error for non-existent schedule
delete() returns error for schedule from different install
delete() succeeds even if job runner schedule already cancelled
